ValidationRule.description: Should not allow any other Status/Stage other than P. Incoming for new NH Zorg Opportunities.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW(), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "P. Incoming")), RecordType.Name = "Zorg", NOT($User.ValidationRulesDoNotApply__c = true) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Status: P. Incoming should be the value for a new Opportunity.
